concept.title: PIN List
concept.shortdesc: PIN List is used to manage lists of PIN (numerical passwords) that can be used to access restricted features such as outbound routes.

p.note: The PIN can also be added to the CDR record.

section.title: Apply a PIN List to Outbound Routes/DISA
section.p: After creating PIN lists, you can linking the PIN lists to Outbound routes or DISA. On outbound route/DISA edit page, you can select the PIN list from the Password drop-down menu.
